reviewText:
great toddler video
always teaches a lesson; my son watches these over and over with lots of laughs every time!
great colors in the video

I purchased this DVD for my 4 year old son.  He absolutely LOVES Curious George so naturally it has been a great gift.  I found that Curious George is teaching my son a few very interesting things about nature and animals too.  It has been almost 20 years since I was in school so I also find myself learning a few things too which is fun and exciting.  Curious George is always a great conversation anytime with my son! FOUR THUMBS UP!!!!

I bought this for ym 2 year old to watch on an in-car DVD player on a recent long drive. He loves Curious George and I do to. The videos and stories are great. However, to get to the main menu of this DVD you have to watch at least five solid minutes of commercials, the DVD is encoded so that you cannot skip them, even if you've seen them before. This means we had to sit through them every time we turn the DVD player back on. I had to sit in the back seat, wait for the commercials with the volume off and only then could I play the episodes. This is the first PBS kids DVD that I bought, the second one had the same issue. I will not buy their DVDs again. I would rather download the episodes and make my own DVDs without enforced commercial viewing.
Since my 3 year old son loves everything curious george this is a great dvd. I highly recommend it. Your toddler will love it.
My 3 yr old son loves Curious George & so do I because it is a fun & eductaional show for him to enjoy & learn from. I love hearing my boy laughing as he watchs all the messes George gets into.

Even though my daughter loves to TALK like George :| you can't beat the fun stories, lessons learned, and ideas on ways you can take and run with the things that George learns (and the children after each episode explore) to enhance your child's learning.  We have an embarrassingly large library of Curious George DVD's, but the stories have really been a great jumping off point for us in getting our four-year-old interested in learning different things. Go, George!!

My 2 and 3 year olds love this curious little monkey.  When they wake up they want Curious George, and before bed they want him again.  I am getting a little tired of the theme song, but the themes and subjects of the shorts are so enthralling to my children that I tolerate it.
 This DVD contains the following shorts:

Pinata Vision
The Fully Automatic Monkey Fun Hat
Surprise Quints
Curious George Meets the Press
Curious George, A Peeling Monkey
Animal Trackers
Something New Under the Sun
Keeping Out Cows.
My child is a big Curious George fan.  He has really enjoyed this DVD and has watched it numerous times.
Good entertainment for the younger folks and some of us older ones too.  Thanks to the good people in charge of this production.
Just got this in the mail and the case is cracked and broken. I don't have time to return it because it's for my son's bday which is very soon. Hope the disc is okay.
Curious George is awesome! Cute Dvd !
New and unopened! It's for a 2yr old!
Who doesn't like George! If you do get all the episodes you can.
Love it
I received theories today for my 3 year old and it did not work
My son is a Curious George fanatic, so anything George related is an automatic win in our house.
Fun video!

Recieved fast! My daughter loves this movie!

my son is a big fan and it is perfect companion for when we travel.

My grandson LOVES Curious George. He loves this DVD.  When my daughter puts it on for him, he refuses to do anything until he finishes watching.  I would recommend this one 100%!

Curious George is my Grandson's best friend. He watches George over and over and the Birthday Party episode came just before his third birthday!

Prompt shipping and in perfect condition.
Decent movie but it gets old after a while.  Check for it on Amazon prime or Netflix first.  My kids watched it twice and that was about it.
My son loves George movies

My 3 year old is on a Curious George kick! Since his birthday, last month, he has been into watching anything birthday related! This DVD has two episodes of a birthday party on it. It keeps his attention and he has learned some funny things from watching these DVDs. One thing he says a lot is, "it's for babies!" He cracks us up!
As always Curious George does not disappoint. My daughter continues to love him and his assorted adventures. Box was in good condition and disc was flawless.
it's exciting to watch George figure out things that are happening in his every-day world, just like kids are wondering and investigating their world. I love PBS kids shows.
This DVD is Awesome! My four year old son loves to watch Curious George, it's also great for the whole family.
This is a delightful collection of birthday parties that Curious George attends, including one for the adult Quints.  Clever and touching stories.  Good for children of all ages.
My four year-old kids like Curious George.  Even I can enjoy watching them.  The contents are worth several times more than its actual price.
I purchased this DVD for my 3 yr old granddaughter.  Her parent use it in the car when they are travelling.
My son loved the Curious George dvd, we wants to watch it every night before he goes to bed, he can't get enough.

Granddaughter loves George. Bought 4 other Curious George DVDS.
All 5 DVDs were packaged together and was very happy to receive them.
I bought these for my grandson.  And we all love them great gifts will buy more throught out the years!
It is PBS episodes on DVD.  Curious George is great.  It is both of my kids favorite cartoon.  It is educational and suitable for any age.

My 2 year old loves watching Curious George on pbs while at home.  We must have several dozen episodes recorded.  Now when we go on road trips, we are able to watch Curious George thanks to the dvds.  They are the same episodes you watch on tv. Each DVD contains 8 shows totaling over 90 minutes of pure entertainment for our child to watch.
